sentences.en: And the emulation experiments show that this method is valid and practicable.
sentences.cn: 计算机仿真试验的结果验证了该方法的有效性和实用性.

sentences.en: By emulation debugging, the system design all right and economical.
sentences.cn: 通过仿真调试, 验证了系统设计合理、经济、适用.

sentences.en: By emulation debugging, the system design is all right and economical.
sentences.cn: 通过仿真调试, 验证了系统设计合理、济、用.

sentences.en: Chaos circuit and emulation of numerical value prove it valid.
sentences.cn: 通过对计算机数值仿真,验证了其有效性.

sentences.en: Emulation result shows expectant optimization efficiency is obtained with genetic algorithm.
sentences.cn: 仿真结果表明用遗传算法取得了预期的优化效果.

sentences.en: Finally, has provided the method of emulation and debugging of the circuit.
sentences.cn: 最后, 给出了电路仿真和调试的方法.

sentences.en: His spirit of assiduous study is worthy of emulation.
sentences.cn: 他刻苦钻研的精神,值得效法.

sentences.en: ISD voice chips use direct emulation storage technology, its application is very wide.
sentences.cn: ISD语音芯片采用直接模拟存储技术, 应用前景广泛.

sentences.en: It is possible to run any emulation on any port.
sentences.cn: 这是有可能运行任何仿真任何港口.

sentences.en: Put forward the design requirement of emulation system environment.
sentences.cn: 并提出了仿真系统环境的设计要求.

sentences.en: The result of the emulation verifies practicability of this method.
sentences.cn: 仿真研究表明,该方法具有一定的实用性.

sentences.en: The results of a computer emulation of the technique are also presented.
sentences.cn: 最后,给出了这种方法的计算机模拟仿真的一些结果.

sentences.en: Then the emulation experiments show that this method is efective and practicable.
sentences.cn: 计算机仿真实验的结果验证了该方法的有效性和实用性.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the enterprisemodeling and emulation analysis tool set in ARIS.
sentences.cn: 介绍了基于过程的ARIS企业建模、仿真分析工具集.

sentences.en: This paper studies the constitute measure, the emulation and amelioration of system.
sentences.cn: 研究了系统的建立方法及软件的仿真与改进.

words.tran_cn: 仿真；模仿；尽力赶上；同…竞争
